name: AmongThem
description:
AmongThem

AmongThem is an online multiplayer game played by at least 3 people. 

One player will create a game and the others can join using the 4-letter Game Id. Once all the players are ready, one player will be assigned the role of an "Imposter" and the rest of the players will be "Spies". 

The players will be displayed a puzzle/question on their screen. The imposter will see the answer to the puzzle as well. The players must discuss and try to solve the puzzle using the chat on the right of the screen. During the discussion, the imposter will try to throw everyone off by trying to turn the discussion in a different direction.

If the Spies are able to answer the puzzle correctly, they win. If they fail to answer the puzzle correctly or if the timer runs out, the Imposter wins.

In each round, a random player will be picked as an Imposter.

IMPORTANT: While the files are present on this page, the game will only work on the hosted version given the multiplayer nature of the game. Please try it out here:

https://amongthem.parthshahk.me
